summary_detail.value: Pre-Evacuation Warning has been issued by the Lincoln Co. Sheriff's Office for the upper end of Bobtail Road north of Bobtail Cutoff, Hutton Drive, Bobtail Cut-off including Winter Road and Whitetail Road, Pipe Creek Road from Forest Way including Lodge Pole Road, Blue Mountain Lookout Road and Doak Creek Road, and Creekside Rd to 17-mile Road. The Lincoln So. Sheriff's Office is asking the public to avoid the Pipe Creek Road, Kootenai River Road, Quartz Creek Road, Quartz Mountain Road, Bobtail Road, and Bobtail Cutoff areas to allow for safe fire response and public

title: Pre-Evacuation Warning-Upper Bobtail Rd, No. Bobtail Cutoff, Hutton Dr. (West Fork Fire Wildfire)
